phrs.translation: 植物化学和人文植物数据库

sentences.sentence: Some ethnobotanical information on rattan were also provided.
sentences.translation: 本文还提供了一些有关藤类的民族植物学资料。

sentences.sentence: Conservation of ethnobotanical culture and searching for the reasons of traditional knowledge losing have been paid more attention by the world.
sentences.translation: 传统植物文化的保存及寻找传统知识流失的原因已成为全世界密切关注的问题。

sentences.sentence: The main objectives of the present research project are: (1) to survey and collect the morpho taxonomic characteristics of bamboo resources based on the ethnobotanical theory and research methods;
sentences.translation: 本研究内容包括：1根据民族植物学的理论和研究方法调查和收集竹类的形态和分类学特性；
